doc.title: Miami
doc.plot: "Miami" is the fourth film by artist Sarah Morris. Operating between a documentary, the biography of a city and a form of non-narrative fiction, "Miami" shifts between sites of production, leisure and work. The Coca-Cola bottling plant, the Grand Prix and the hotels of Morris Lapidus are just a few of the places that interweave in a driving sequence of urban images that combine towards a new ultra-vision of a place.
